title: Tailfin Rear Top Tube Bag Expands Top Tube Storage
content:
Bristol-based Tailfin has been building its line of frame storage since 2022. In that time, the brand has introduced two downtube bags, eight top tube bags, and nine frame bags. Now, the makers of waterproof bags for touring and bikepacking races introduces the latest addition to its frame cargo lineup: the Rear Top Tube Bag…

This compact and carefully designed bag transforms the often-overlooked space in front of the seatpost into practical, accessible storage—keeping essentials within easy reach without causing interference.

 

 

Available in two purpose-specific versions:

  • Road/Gravel: Narrower profile, taller, 100-degree angle, 0.8L volume, 109g.
  • Mountain Bike: Wider profile, shorter, 85-degree angle, 0.9L volume, 112g.

The Rear Top Tube Bag is a by-product of extensive development research and rider feedback. Each bag incorporates Tailfin’s latest generation ultra-stable, frame-friendly ‘V-Mount’ attachment system. These V-Mount attachments utilize internal carbon battens that eliminate bulging and thigh rub, plus a fully waterproof construction.

Rear Top Tube Bag Quick Hits

  • Advanced Construction: Hypalon and Ripstop Nylon are carefully combined using 3D weld technology for a seamless, tapered, waterproof construction
  • Next-Generation V-Mount System: Unmatched stability with multiple attachment points, compatible with existing Tailfin Frame Bags
  • Internal Carbon Battens: Prevent bag bulge, ensuring smooth, single-handed zipper operation
  • Patented Zipper Gutter: Innovative design maintains waterproofing despite reversed zipper orientation
  • Accessibility: Zipper opens front-to-back, enhancing visibility and ease of access even on small frames or dropped saddles
  • Removable Shock-Absorbing Insole: Provides cushioning and makes cleaning easy
  • Multiple Attachment Options: Compatible with strap-sharing setups across Tailfin’s entire frame bag lineup.

  • MTB (0.9L): £55/$80/€70
